section.heading: Exemptions for certain parts, tools, supplies and services relating to tangible personal property used or consumed in production

content.p:
Receipts from
the retail sales of parts with a useful life of one year or less, tools
and supplies for use or consumption directly and predominantly in the
production of tangible personal property, gas, electricity,
refrigeration or steam for sale by manufacturing, processing,
generating, assembling, refining, mining or extracting shall be exempt
from the tax imposed by subdivision
of section eleven hundred five\nof this article.\n
Receipts from every sale of the services of installing, repairing,\nmaintaining or servicing the tangible personal property described in\nparagraph twelve of subdivision
of section eleven hundred fifteen of\nthis article, including the parts with a useful life of one year or\nless, tools and supplies described in subdivision
of this section,\nto the extent subject to such tax, shall be exempt from the tax on sales\nimposed under subdivision
of section eleven hundred five of this\narticle.\n
Parts with a useful life of one year or less, tools and supplies\ndescribed in subdivision
of this section and services described in\nsubdivision
of this section shall be exempt from the compensating\nuse tax imposed by section eleven hundred ten of this article.\n
